title: Permanently Suspended For No Reason!
body: Ok so this all started a couple days ago when i noticed that the Project Ashe skin I had purchased was not in my inventory of skins and my rp was replenished by 1820 rp. I never refunded the skin or anything it was just gone. Like a normal player would do, I emailed Riot Games support letting them know about the issue. Then i received an email from the billing team asking me to fill in all this information about my account. Next thing I know is I get another email saying this: Greetings ComicsHero, Actions that have been performed on your account are in violation of the League of Legends Terms of Use. You can review these terms at http://www.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse, Due to the severity of this violation, your League of Legends account has been banned until Mon Feb 22 22:22:22 UTC 2100. I never once comprimised or violated the League of Legends Terms of Use, so can somebody please explain to me why my account that I have spent a lot of time and money on has been suspended.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it seems that the account was locked as a protective suspension.  I do see that you're currently in contact with an account specialist who will continue assisting you with this.  Continue speaking with them, and also go over our[ account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide to make sure you're using good security practices on your account.  You'll hear back asap!
Ok so I should have my account back soon then? Ok thanks!
